question: What is the maximum number of credits a student can register for in one term without special approval in the College of Arts and Science? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 12 B. 16 C. 18 D. 20
By which week must a student drop a course to avoid receiving a grade of W? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. Second week B. Third week C. Fifth week D. Fourteenth week
Which grade indicates an official withdrawal from a course in good academic standing? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. I B. F C. W D. NR
What is the GPA value assigned to a grade of B+ in the College of Arts and Science? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 3.667 B. 3.333 C. 3.000 D. 3.250
What is the maximum number of independent study credits a student can take in a single department? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 4 B. 6 C. 8 D. 12
What is the maximum number of courses a student can repeat for credit during their undergraduate career? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 1 B. 2 C. 3 D. Unlimited
How many total credits from online courses can be counted toward the CAS degree? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 4 B. 8 C. 12 D. 16
Which of the following grades is NOT included in GPA calculation? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. B B. D C. P D. F

When does a temporary grade of Incomplete (I) automatically convert to an F? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. After one month B. After one semester C. After one academic year D. Never

How many points of credit may a student earn from courses taken in other divisions of NYU (e.g., business, applied art)? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 8 B. 12 C. 16 D. Unlimited
Which grade is assigned to students auditing a course? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. I B. R C. P D. NR

Which office must approve a studentâ€™s complete withdrawal from all courses in a term? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. Registrar B. Financial Aid Office C. Advising Center D. Dean's Office
What is the maximum number of advanced standing credits (AP + prior college credit) a first-year student can receive? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 16 B. 24 C. 32 D. 64
How many weeks into a semester can a student add a course without special approval? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 1 B. 2 C. 3 D. 4

Which of the following is **not** a valid reason for a student to repeat a course? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. Received a grade of C B. Received a W C. Want a better GPA D. Completed a more advanced course in the sequence
What is the minimum GPA required for satisfactory academic standing in CAS? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. 1.5 B. 2.0 C. 2.25 D. 2.5

What happens if a student does not remove an Incomplete (I) within the allowed time frame? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. It remains on the transcript indefinitely B. It becomes NR C. It becomes W D. It becomes F
What is the grade of NR used for? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. Unofficial withdrawal B. No Record submitted by instructor C. Audit D. Incomplete course
Which grade reflects that a student has passed a class under the Pass/Fail option? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. D B. P C. I D. W

What must a student do to audit a course in CAS? You must answer with only one letter: A, B, C, or D. A. Register online directly B. Submit a signed add/drop form with 'register as auditor' noted C. Get permission from a classmate D. Email the Registrar
